FuncDef: Watchdog messages are used to verify liveliness of a Diameter peer. A single watchdog messages will be sent to a peer in case that no traffic is received from it within a configured watchdog-timer. This watchdog request message will solicit a watchdog answer message from the peer. If no traffic (watchdog answer or otherwise) is received from the peer in response to watchdog request while the watchdog timer is running, the peer will be put in suspicious state and a peer failover routine will be triggered.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the device watchdog timer, in seconds, used on all connections by this peer. Values-1 to 1000.
